pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better)
  • DirectX: Version 10

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.66 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200, 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 670 or NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 1050 / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7950 or AMD® Radeon™ R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 52 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100, 3.10 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 780 or NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 1060-6GB / AMD® Radeon™ R9 290 or RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-Bit Only
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Bandwidth requirements depend on the resolution and quality of the video being played. Please see the Steam 360 Video FAQ for more information.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 1GHz or Faster
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 with latest service packs
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2Ghz or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT 512MB or AMD Radeon HD 2900XT 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.66GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD2600, Geforce 8600, with 512 MB VRam or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mackbook 2013 or later
